title: (Lead Sings) Show Me The River, Show Me The Pool,
lyrics:
(Lead Sings) Show me the river, Show me the pool,
(Church Sings) Show me the river where John Baptized
(Lead Sings) Show me the river, Show me the pool,
(Church Sings) Show me the river where John Baptized
(Lead Sings) I baptized and you baptized,
(Church Sings) Show me the river where John Baptized
(Lead Sings) John baptized in the river of Jordan,
(Church Sings) Show me the river where John Baptized
**Lead has option to freestyle**
